sys_ui_message.key: the details of your sick leave pay can be found as follows: 1. access your people portal, and select **log a case** 2. under categories select **payroll payment request** 3. complete the mandatory fields 4. click on **submit**
sys_ui_message.message: The details of your sick leave pay can be found as follows: 1. Access your people portal, and select **log a case** 2. Under categories select **Payroll Payment request** 3. Complete the mandatory fields 4. Click on **submit**
sys_ui_message.sys_name: the details of your sick leave pay can be found as follows: 1. access your people portal, and select **log a case** 2. under categories select **payroll payment request** 3. complete the mandatory fields 4. click on **submit**
